20110114150738.000|20110114150741.000|CC1|I HONESTLY LIKE PEOPLE AND HAVE 
20110114150741.000|20110114150743.000|CC1|A RAPPORT WITH PEOPLE AND LIKE  
20110114150743.000|20110114150746.000|CC1|LEARNING ABOUT THEM.            
20110114150746.000|20110114150748.000|CC1|I WAS ASKING YOUR FOLKS HERE

20110114150751.000|20110114150751.000|CC1|WAITING.

20110114152245.000|20110114152245.000|CC1|When you realize that depression
20110114152245.000|20110114152248.000|CC1|  has left you nowhere to go.   
20110114152248.000|20110114152248.000|CC1| When you've lost interest in   
20110114152248.000|20110114152250.000|CC1|          everything.           
20110114152248.000|20110114152248.000|XDS|%    TITLE:   
20110114152249.000|20110114152249.000|XDS|%    TITLE: LLCY00188H
20110114152250.000|20110114152250.000|CC1| When you've had one too many   
20110114152250.000|20110114152253.000|CC1|days feeling sad or anxious...  
20110114152253.000|20110114152256.000|CC1|   aches and pains, fatigue.    
20110114152256.000|20110114152256.000|CC1|When it becomes hard to ignore  
20110114152256.000|20110114152258.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20110114152258.000|20110114152300.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20110114152300.000|20110114152301.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110114152301.000|20110114152301.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110114152301.000|20110114152305.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110114152305.000|20110114152305.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110114152305.000|20110114152307.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110114152307.000|20110114152307.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110114152307.000|20110114152310.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110114152310.000|20110114152310.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110114152310.000|20110114152310.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110114152310.000|20110114152314.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110114152314.000|20110114152314.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110114152314.000|20110114152316.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110114152316.000|20110114152316.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110114152316.000|20110114152318.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110114152318.000|20110114152318.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110114152318.000|20110114152321.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110114152321.000|20110114152321.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110114152321.000|20110114152323.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110114152323.000|20110114152323.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110114152323.000|20110114152325.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110114152325.000|20110114152325.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110114152325.000|20110114152328.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110114152328.000|20110114152328.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110114152328.000|20110114152331.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110114152331.000|20110114152331.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110114152331.000|20110114152333.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110114152333.000|20110114152333.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110114152333.000|20110114152336.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110114152336.000|20110114152337.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110114152337.000|20110114152337.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110114152337.000|20110114152339.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110114152339.000|20110114152339.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110114152339.000|20110114152342.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20110114152342.000|20110114152342.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20110114152342.000|20110114152344.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.        
20110114152344.000|20110114152344.000|CC1|Dizziness or fainting may occur 
20110114152344.000|20110114152346.000|CC1|         upon standing.         
20110114152346.000|20110114152346.000|CC1|Side effects include nausea, dry
20110114152346.000|20110114152350.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.    
20110114152350.000|20110114152351.000|CC1|      Is today your day?        
20110114152351.000|20110114152352.000|CC1|      Talk to your doctor...    
20110114152352.000|20110114152352.000|CC1|  and go to Cymbalta.com for a  
20110114152352.000|20110114152356.000|CC1|  free 30-capsule trial offer.  
20110114152356.000|20110114152358.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.
